commentInfo: Every commentXXX key here is not used and serves only one purpose - to describe everything in this file :) You don't need to include these in your custom files.
commentInfo2: You can use NNDDefaults.json as a starting point without any comments.
commentNaming: All keys should be prefixed with NND_ to make strings unique, so that Skyrim won't mess with their case
commentOptionality: All keys are optional and can be skipped if not applicable. This file shows all default values for keys.
commentGiven: This section defines rules for Given (First) names.

NND_Given.commentMale: Rules specific to Male. If omitted mod will fallback to NND_Any if present, otherwise Male NPCs won't get a Given name.

NND_Male.commentChance: Chance that Male NPC will get any name picked. If Given name isn't picked, then Family is guaranteed regardless of NND_Chance configured there.
NND_Male.commentNames: List of all availalbe Male names.
NND_Male.commentPrefix: Allows to add randomized prefixes. Note that prefixes only apply if Given name was picked.
NND_Male.commentSuffix: Allows to add randomized suffixes. Note that suffixes only apply if Given name was picked.
NND_Male.commentCircumfix: Allows to add randomized circumfixes. Note that circumfixes only apply if Given name was picked.
NND_Male.commentCircumfixDetails: Circumfix is a pair of prefix and suffix that should be applied together. They are written in form 'pre><pos'
NND_Male.commentCircumfixDetails2: For example word 'enlighten' would be split into a name 'light' and circumfix 'en><en'

NND_Given.commentFemale: Rules specific to Female. If omitted mod will fallback to NND_Any if present, otherwise Female NPCs won't get a Given name.
NND_Given.commentAny: Generic rules. If omitted mod will only use gender-specific rules if they present, otherwise NPC won't get a Given name
NND_Given.commentBehavior: Behaviors are a list of options to customize how this Name Definition handles missing name parts

NND_Behavior.commentCombine: When enabled and Given name was not picked, it allows the framework to look for Given name in the next Name Definition

commentFamily: This section defines rules for Family (Last) names. See NND_Given for details on each section.
commentConjunctions: This section defines how Given and Family names get connected. Same gender rules apply as in other sections.
commentBehavior: Name Definition itself also has Behavior that controls whole definition

NND_Behavior.commentChance: Name Definition can have a chance of being skipped. By default Definition is never skipped.
NND_Behavior.commentChance2: This option is ignored if the Name Definition is the last in queue, as othwerise NPC might not get a name at all.
NND_Behavior.commentObscuring: Obscuring behavior determines what names this definition generates. When set to `true` names in this definition will be used only for unknown NPCs.
